summary: Plan, track, and blog your trips
reviews: It's good so far | Great way to document and save trip details | So far so good...only Day 5 in. | What a great application..Would recommend it to everyone. | No matter what I do in settings eg high accuracy, auto or manual, allow background running etc it only ever tracks in a straight line UNLESS I've got my phone out of my pocket and the app open which is not practically possible. | Great APP and loved getting all of our trip photos on line as we travelled. Just getting together remaining shots before we print our book. | So far, so good! Folk want to visit my blog but don't want to sign up to FP to read it. | I'm not sure if it is a bug, but for me, its "optimised" tracker consumes way too much battery. To be more specific for Samsung S23U on recent trip just over the course of an hour or two it consumed 7% when it wasn't opened a single time (tracker in the beginning of the trip was set to balanced). For the perspective, it is a similar amount to whatsapp consumption, except whatsapp was actively used to make video calls this time. Can't put a positive mark if it is like that. | An excellent app! My neighbor turned me on to it and the travel book He showed us was both beautiful and reasonable in price! | It is very good and helps to remember the memories and order of the trip. I wish I could upload more videos | Great guys ! Hoping to follow their adventures | Love using this app when traveling. More secure than FB. | Great App to Create, Safe, and share your most exciting experiences with friends and family. I love this app! User-friendly and not intrusive. | Difficult to use. No clear instructions. | Love this app! We primarily use it as a diary of our trips and travels, and if people want to follow us, that's all good. | Love this app. Its so easy and fun. | Still new to the app hence only 4 stars 😊 | great travel tool | awesome travel app! | really like how this app tracked my travels and made a great chronological path of where I went. it's a brilliant way remember a holiday. and best of all it's free! please don't change this app | Used for the first time and it is great do far. | There is no list of countries u can simply select from, and "complete your places" is not accurate. Florence, Munich, and many other cities are showing up is something else. | very good app. the uploads can be frustratingly slow and it would be even better if it offered in-app editing of pics | Awesome app to blog your travels. Looking forward to using this going forward | Very nice | This is a great app for a travel diary. One of the original and still right top of the hea. Being able to order a book is a bonus. | I really love this app. Easy to use, great for travelling (i like it a lot more than polarsteps!) I'm using it to track my world travel (premium account). It has everything i need. There is a limitation of 20 pictures per entry and sometimes i'm struggling to choose from all the photos i'll take but actually it's better to have a limit so the entry is not overloaded! Big plus: you can do captions! | Absolute rubbish. Couldn't locate the countries or cities I was recording as visited.. Came up as totally different places. | love this app like that you can add another person to the trip! only wish you could 👍🏻❤️ peoples comments on your picture! | Brilliant way to travelogue. So easy to push a photo into the journal and update later. | This app is great. So far, so good. I am really curious to see the manner in which the photo album is assembled and its quality. If this process is comparable to the the initial creation, it will be very good! | Really easy to use - as someone who doesn't use much social media, this was a really nice way for family and friends to follow our trip across Asia | The family loves it. Great for extended family to follow what we're up to. | Very easy to use and stores all the info that I need. | really like this app for a mixture of tracking, photos and story telling | It is easy to handle | It has potential. Multi traveler experience isnt that great. Had a traver delete my footprint and found no recyle bin. Not the easiest to navigate period. Concept is pretty good though | It's only day 3 using this, but I am struggling with it. Want to add more photos to day 1, but can't insert. Would like to add a screenshot to location. | Placed order over a week ago, no update, sent follow-up, no response. | Great app - kept a record of all our good memories. | Very nice app, I could post together with my boyfriend all infos and pictures of our travel. An upgrade I would really like: The possibility to upload the footprint as draft so that also other people that are taking part to the trip are able to modify the footprint draft, before actually posting it. A small bug I noticed: When you have 2 consequent videos in your footprint the first one cannot be played normally. | This program is so useful for keeping track of your travels and the photo books are beautiful . | We love being able to record our trips & add photos. The bonus is getting a book printed! | A great travellers app. shows a map and a time line and where photos were taken. | Good app, similar and perhaos improved over Polarsteps. I like that you can embed a part of your trip in your website. Also the facility to attach documents. I would like to be able to export all of my data and photos, basically as insurance - the one important feature Polarsteps has over this app. | Displays ads in your notifications (e.g. "10% photo book discount"). Much worse, they are in the same notification category as new posts from your friends, so you can't disable them unless you also disable new posts notifications... This is really invasive. | enjoying it a lot | Super well done and easy to use. I would recommend adding an intermediate pricing between free (too cheap) and 30 USD per year (too much for the extra features). | I loved this app, works amazingly to share stories with families and friends. But now they've changed it so you have to pay to post anything of substance and it's quite expensive too. Will continue to use it for my current trip but not in future | Love this travel app! | Enjoying the app so far. | Really nice app, should add a parks/heritage sights/ unesco places chart | Nice | Early days, but so far, so good, easy to understand, and upload photos. | Great app. Stable and user friendly. If you don't do social media and want to keep your family updated while travelling this is the app for you. The book is great quality and effortless to make. | Lovely app for sharing travel adventures with family and friends. I especially liked that they didn't have to download the app or create an account, so even my mum could work it out and follow where I'd been and show the Footprints to her friends. The app itself is easy and quick to use, convenient to use offline until internet is available again and I liked only being able to upload 20 photos (and 2 videos) for each Footprint - it really made me focus on what I wanted to share. Thanks guys! | Inspiring | Fancy and well designed! But how do you communicate sustainability awareness while encouraging to travel the whole world (by plane)? Saving our habitat earth together should be a considerable collective focus as well these days, otherwise we can't really travel anymore at all soon enough 🌱✌️💙 | This app works well, even for an old guy like me! We are using it for travel and keeping track of our friends walking the Camino. | Fantastic app - and easy to make photo books. Actually very useful to catalogue pictures not only for traveling. | Great app for tracking journey and adding pics. | awesome app for tracking holiday pictures and places | Buggy buggy. Can't add followers. Sister had same issue. | My only issue is the narrow window to type in. Although it might be me. | Very good and easy to use. | LOVE LOVE LOVE the book I had made with FindPenguins after using their app on my last trip!! | Tracking and loading pictures is good, but it won't let me download Ebook despite paying Premium. Update. Thanks for your reply. Yes, 1 star was far too low. I'll try again but having spent a long time trying to get an Ebook without success it was frustrating. Further update. You have to switch on in app purchase to get your Premium membership even though you pay online. Not sure why it doesn't just update. ALL GOOD NOW. | Excellent and fun way to share an adventure | Great idea - a couple of improvements maybe. Need to be able to access all shared photos in shared Google photo albums and GPS tracking seems a bit flakey | App LOOKS very useful and exciting but does not work. I would pay for this app if the errors were fixed. | Does what it says it does really well, although prefer another app myself. But the exporting of videos does not offer a map view showing the steps and (EDIT: an animated) route between photos, so just not what I wanted unfortunately. | love it!!!! | Solid program, Great Book- high quality. The usability within a group, specifically connecting them to me was pain...and not well thought out. | Terrible, this app did not help me find even one penguin. I have never been more disappointed in an app | I found the app easy to use immediately. As I use it I discover more features that make it even better, such as being able to re-order the photos on a footprint. | Just started our trip yesterday...so far, so good! Looking forward to seeing it work for the entire trip! So excited! | This app was the best! It allowed me to keep my family and friends updated on my long trip overseas and also give me a chance to look back at my own trip once I was home. Would highly recommend. | Great app and you don't need data or wifi | Great app to cover your trips short or long. It tracks all places you go to thru location on your phone. You can add photos and comments aswell. You can also share what you put in the app. | Great app once you understand the procedure | Works great, so easy to use. Easy to change posts, add locations and pics. | Nonsense | Great | The app has been crashing when I click on countries. Other than that, fantastic way for me to track my own travels | good | I love this app!! I can keep all my trips here and share with my friends and family, also with other people arround the world | It is fantastic app I have seen. The print the trip is very cool and More loveable. I have one suggestion that the footprint connection is straight line can you make the line into travel root (like google map Show the way). | found it hard to invite people to follow us | generally good ap. I've been happy with it. The only thing it does poorly is find pictures in shared albums from google photos. If you are getting pictures from others, and want to put them in your feed, you basically have to make a local copy. | This app is a Fantastic and easy way to log your adventures and share with family and friends | Does not track penguins. | As a first time user, I don't encountered any problem currently but will review later when I get use to it. | A great tool for a travel blog. | As someone who is not on social media, I found this app to be very intuitive and easy to use. I'm loving it so far. I'd like to be able to put captions on the pictures though. Is there a way to do that? | Very easy to use. Good presentation. | amazing app for travelers | Really like this app. | Outstanding app. | tolle App um Reisen festzuhalten und mit anderen zu teilen. speziell die Kartenfunktion, mit Strecke und Footprints, finde ich super. Sehr zu empfehlen | great travel diary!
